1255400.name: Crusaders of the Lost Idols: Ariadne Taskmaster Pack
1255400.description:
Taskmasters are helpers who can automate parts of the game. Assign them to click monsters, level Crusaders, or use abilities, to save your precious energy!

Taskmasters can:
  • Auto level a Crusader, one click per second. Will purchase upgrades if there are unbought upgrades.
  • Auto click monsters (yes, this counts for the achievements), if click damage will hit a monster. 5 clicks per second, up to 4 taskmasters can be assigned to click monsters.
  • 3 assigned to clicking monsters will automatically pick up dropped gold and quest items
  • 4 assigned to clicking monsters will act like pressing the right arrow key to initiate an area transition, immediately on area completion.
  • 5 assigned to clicking monsters will give you a bonus click per second per Taskmaster, so you go from 20 to 30 clicks per second.
  • Auto use the various buff cards when the timer has expired.
  • Auto use a specific ability (Firestorm, Storm Rider, etc.)
  • Keep auto-progress turned on.


In this pack:

  • Taskmaster: Ariadne!
  • 5000 Common crafting materials!
